properties.description: Move files from one folder to another folder

activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterate each file, and move them one by one.

activities.name: CopyAFile
activities.description: Copy a file from the source store to the destination store.

activities.name: DeleteAFile
activities.description: Delete a file from the source store

activities.name: FilterFiles
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TOP 1 [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'ADJ_MNL_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME, RUNNING_STATE FROM (
SELECT ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME, 1 AS RUNNING_STATE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_RUN_STATUS] = 'RUNNING'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'ADJ_MNL_%'
UNION
SELECT 'NO FILE' AS ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME, 0 AS RUNNING_STATE
)x
ORDER BY RUNNING_STATE DESC;

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'OPS_ANSWERS_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Answers]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'OPS_QUESTIONS_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

properties.description: It describes the folder in the data source store.
It describes the file in the data source store.
It describes the folder in the data source store.
NOTE:This DF only cater for INSERT. There is no Update to Expire for consideration The branch containing "UpdateSelectForExpire" kept for reference only

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT TRX.[Trx_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Code]\n      ,TRX.[Fund_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Asset_ID]\n      ,TRX.[GL_Code]\n      ,CASE WHEN COA.GL_Code IS NOT NULL THEN COA.[Cash_Flow_Code] ELSE TRX.Cash_Flow_Code END AS Cash_Flow_Code\n      ,TRX.[Debit_Credit]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Type]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Date]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Desc]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Amount]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions] TRX\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Chart_of_Account] COA\n  ON TRX.GL_Code = COA.GL_Code AND COA.record_deleted_flag = 0\n  WHERE TRX.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND DATEDIFF(DAY,TRX.Update_datetime,CONVERT(smalldatetime,CONVERT(datetimeoffset, SYSDATETIME()) AT TIME ZONE \'AUS Eastern Standard Time\')) <= 365',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND [Trx_Type] = \'Actual\'\n  AND [Trx_Desc] = \'Beginning Balance:\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Trx_ID = Trx_ID,
		Relation_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		Relation_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		Relation_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc,
		Relation_Trx_Amount = Trx_Amount,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@TrxCodeNotBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow, SelectBeginingBalanceColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionNewTransactions
AddAuditColumns select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly select(mapColumn(
		RelationBB_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		RelationBB_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		RelationBB_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		RelationBB_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		RelationBB_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		RelationBB_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		RelationBB_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDBcolumnsBeginningBalance
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow split(Trx_Type != 'Actual' || Trx_Desc != 'Beginning Balance:',
	disjoint: false) ~> IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@(TrxCodeNotBeginningBalance, TrxCodeBeginningBalance)
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@TrxCodeBeginningBalance, SelectDBcolumnsBeginningBalance lookup(Trx_Code == RelationBB_Trx_Code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupDBbeginningBalance
LookupDBbeginningBalance split(isNull(RelationBB_Trx_Code),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsTrxCodeBeginningBalanceExist@(NewTrxCodeBeginningBalance, ExistingTrxCodeBeginningBalance)
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalanceExist@NewTrxCodeBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBeginingBalanceColumns
UnionNewTransactions derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
SelectOutput alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==0)) ~> AlterRowInsert
AlterRowInsert sink(input(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,0),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertRecords

properties.description:
NOTE:This DF only cater for INSERT. There is no Update to Expire for consideration The branch containing "UpdateSelectForExpire" kept for reference only
Check for Beginning Balance is deprecated but remained in DF in case we ever need to use it again

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT TRX.[Trx_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Code]\n      ,TRX.[Fund_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Asset_ID]\n      ,TRX.[GL_Code]\n      ,CASE WHEN COA.GL_Code IS NOT NULL THEN COA.[Cash_Flow_Code] ELSE TRX.Cash_Flow_Code END AS Cash_Flow_Code\n      ,TRX.[Debit_Credit]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Type]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Date]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Desc]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Amount]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions] TRX\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Chart_of_Account] COA\n  ON TRX.GL_Code = COA.GL_Code AND COA.record_deleted_flag = 0\n  WHERE TRX.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND DATEDIFF(DAY,TRX.Update_datetime,CONVERT(smalldatetime,CONVERT(datetimeoffset, SYSDATETIME()) AT TIME ZONE \'AUS Eastern Standard Time\')) <= 365',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND [Trx_Type] = \'Actual\'\n  AND [Trx_Desc] = \'Beginning Balance:\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Trx_ID = Trx_ID,
		Relation_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		Relation_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		Relation_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc,
		Relation_Trx_Amount = Trx_Amount,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@AllRecordsIncludeBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow, SelectBeginingBalanceColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionNewTransactions
AddAuditColumns select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly select(mapColumn(
		RelationBB_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		RelationBB_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		RelationBB_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		RelationBB_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		RelationBB_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		RelationBB_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		RelationBB_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDBcolumnsBeginningBalance
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow split(true(),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@(AllRecordsIncludeBeginningBalance, DeprecatedTrxCodeBeginningBalance)
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@DeprecatedTrxCodeBeginningBalance, SelectDBcolumnsBeginningBalance lookup(Trx_Code == RelationBB_Trx_Code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupDBbeginningBalance
LookupDBbeginningBalance split(isNull(RelationBB_Trx_Code),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsTrxCodeBeginningBalanceExist@(NewTrxCodeBeginningBalance, ExistingTrxCodeBeginningBalance)
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalanceExist@NewTrxCodeBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBeginingBalanceColumns
UnionNewTransactions derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
SelectOutput alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==0)) ~> AlterRowInsert
AlterRowInsert sink(input(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,0),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertRecords

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT ASS.[Fund_ID]\n      ,ASS.[Asset_ID]\n      ,[Status]\n      ,[Product]\n      ,COA.[GL_Code]\nFROM [staging].[Forecast_GL_Product_Map] STA\nLEFT JOIN [relational].Asset ASS\nON STA.Fund_ID = ASS.Fund_ID AND STA.Asset_ID = ASS.Asset_ID AND ASS.record_deleted_flag = 0\nLEFT JOIN [relational].Chart_of_Account COA\nON STA.GL_Code = COA.GL_Code AND COA.record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[Status]\n      ,[Product]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n	  ,[start_datetime]\n	  ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[Forecast_GL_Product_Map]\nWHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,Status,Product,GL_Code)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Status == Relation_Status
	&& Product == Relation_Product,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,Status,Product,GL_Code)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Status = Status,
		Relation_Product = Product,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_start_datetime = start_datetime,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(1))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1)) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Status = Relation_Status,
		Product = Relation_Product,
		GL_Code = Relation_GL_Code,
		start_datetime = Relation_start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		record_deleted_flag
	),

parameters{

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Reporting_Period]\n      ,[UID]\n      ,[Attribute]\n      ,[Text_Response]\n      ,[Numeric_Response]\n FROM [staging].[OPS_Answers]',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationDB
ConvertDataType derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Asset_ID,Fund_ID,Text_Response,Numeric_Response)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(UID == Relation_UID
	&& Reporting_Period == Relation_Reporting_Period
	&& Attribute == Relation_Attribute,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Asset_ID,Fund_ID,Text_Response,Numeric_Response)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_UID = UID,
		Relation_Attribute = Attribute,
		Relation_Text_Response = Text_Response,
		Relation_Numeric_Response = Numeric_Response,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForUpdate
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForUpdate union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
UnionForDB alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowForUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Numeric_Response = toDecimal(Numeric_Response,19,4)) ~> ConvertDataType
AlterRowForUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['UID','Reporting_Period','Attribute'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow

source(output(
		Date as string,
		Transaction_Code as string,
		Cashflow_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Description as string,
		Amount as string,
		Debit_Credit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetAssetMaster
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[Category]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetGLCodes
CheckAmoutNotNull@ValidAmountAndDateAndTrxCode select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
UnionAll derive(Debit_Credit = upper(Debit_Credit),
		Trx_Amount = abs(toDecimal(Amount,18,2))) ~> SetDerivations
SetDerivations select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Date = Date,
		Trx_Code = Transaction_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		Trx_Desc = GL_Description,
		validation_error = Validation_Error,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForTarget
SelectSourceColumns, SelectFundColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupFundAndAsset
GetAssetMaster select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFundColumns
SelectGLData, SelectCOAcolumns lookup(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupGLcode
GetGLCodes select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCOAcolumns
TransactionValidFundAsset@ValidFundAsset split(not(isNull(GL_Code)) && ( Trx_Type <=> 'Actual' || Trx_Type <=> 'Elimination' || Trx_Type <=> 'GL Adjustment' ),
	isNull(GL_Code) && Trx_Type <=> 'CF Adjustment',
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionTypeGL@(TransactionTypeGL, TransactionTypeCF, InvalidTransaction)
TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGLData
DerivedColumnInvalidTransaction select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidTransaction
LookupGLcode split(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitValidGL@(ValidGL, NotValidGL)
LookupFundAndAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Fund_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionValidFundAsset@(ValidFundAsset, InvalidFundAsset)
DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundAssetData
TransactionValidFundAsset@InvalidFundAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Fund or Asset')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund
ConditionalSplitValidGL@NotValidGL derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid GL Code')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL
DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidGLdata
ConditionalSplitValidGL@ValidGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidGLdata
SelectValidGLdata, SelectInvalidGLdata, SelectInvalidTransaction, SelectInvalidFundAssetData, SelectCashFlow, SelectInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeGL derive(GL_Code = trim(GL_Code,'\'')) ~> TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Amount = toDecimal(Amount,18,2,'###,###.##'),
		Date = toTimestamp(Date,'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> ConvertAmountToValidFormat
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeCF select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCashFlow
TransactionTypeGL@InvalidTransaction derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid transaction type')) ~> DerivedColumnInvalidTransaction
ConvertAmountToValidFormat split(not(isNull(Transaction_Code)) && not(isNull(Date)) && not(isNull(Amount)) && (Debit_Credit <=> 'Dr' || Debit_Credit <=> 'Cr'),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckAmoutNotNull@(ValidAmountAndDateAndTrxCode, InvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode)
CheckAmoutNotNull@InvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Transaction Code or Date or Amount or Debit Credit indicator'),
		Derived_Date = toTimestamp('31/12/9999','dd/MM/yyyy'),
		Derived_Amount = toDecimal(0,18,2),
		Derived_TrxCode = toString('Null Trx Code')) ~> DerivedInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode
DerivedInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode select(mapColumn(
		Date = Derived_Date,
		Transaction_Code = Derived_TrxCode,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount = Derived_Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode
SelectForTarget sink(input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		validation_error
	)) ~> StagingDB

		Relation_Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGLData
DerivedColumnInvalidTransaction select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidTransaction
LookupGLcode split(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitValidGL@(ValidGL, NotValidGL)
LookupFundAndAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Fund_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionValidFundAsset@(ValidFundAsset, InvalidFundAsset)
DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundAssetData
TransactionValidFundAsset@InvalidFundAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Fund or Asset')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund
ConditionalSplitValidGL@NotValidGL derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid GL Code')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL
DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidGLdata
ConditionalSplitValidGL@ValidGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidGLdata
SelectValidGLdata, SelectInvalidGLdata, SelectInvalidTransaction, SelectInvalidFundAssetData, SelectCashFlow, SelectInvalidAmount union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeGL derive(GL_Code = trim(GL_Code,'\'')) ~> TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Amount = toDecimal(Amount,18,2,'###,###.##')) ~> ConvertAmountToValidFormat
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeCF select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCashFlow
TransactionTypeGL@InvalidTransaction derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid transaction type')) ~> DerivedColumnInvalidTransaction
ConvertAmountToValidFormat split(not(isNull(Amount)),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckAmoutNotNull@(ValidAmount, InvalidAmount)
CheckAmoutNotNull@InvalidAmount derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Amount or Debit Credit indicator')) ~> DerivedInvalidAmount
DerivedInvalidAmount select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidAmount
SelectForTarget sink(input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		validation_error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [UID]\n      ,[SLI_ID]\n      ,[Ops_Report_ID]\n      ,[Metric_Group]\n      ,[Metric_Sub_Group]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Questions]',
	format: 'query') ~> OpsQuestions
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Asset_Name]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> Asset
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
SelectSourceColumns, SelectQuestionKey lookup(UID == Question_UID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LkpOpsQuestionUID
OpsQuestions select(mapColumn(
		Question_UID = UID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectQuestionKey
Asset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Asset_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAssetKey
LkpAsset derive(Validation_Error = iif(isNull(Question_UID)||isNull(Asset_Asset_ID),'Error in UID or Fund or Asset',iif(isNull(toDate(Reporting_Period,'dd/MM/yyyy')),'Error in date',toString(null())))) ~> DerivedValidationError
LkpOpsQuestionUID, SelectAssetKey lookup(Asset_ID == Asset_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Asset_Fund_ID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LkpAsset
DerivedValidationError sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Requirement_Question,
		References,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,

		Active,
		Forest,
		Saw_Mill,
		Carbon,
		AUS,
		NZ,
		US,
		Malaysia
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string,
		Requirement_Question as string,
		Reference as string,
		Dimension as string,
		Reporting_Format as string,
		Report_Frequency as string,
		Active as string,
		Forest as string,
		Saw_Mill as string,
		Carbon as string,
		AUS as string,
		NZ as string,
		US as string,
		Malaysia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Requirement_Question,
		Reference = References,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,
		Report_Frequency,
		Active,
